hsts-tog:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as label for the checkbox which is used to enable HSTS.

This should be consistent with:
* {{msg-mw|Hsts-https-tog}}
hsts-https-tog:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as label for the checkbox which is used to enable HSTS.
Displayed when the connection is not HTTPS but only HTTP.

This should be consistent with:
* {{msg-mw|Hsts-tog}}
hsts-beta-feature-message: Title of HSTS as a beta feature (BetaFeatures extension)
hsts-beta-feature-description: Description of HSTS as a beta feature (BetaFeatures extension)
